name: The Marshmallow Murder Mystery
description:
You've been accused of killing someone!? 

Try to prove your innocence by searching for clues around the house and  finding the true murderer, you'll be given a chance to divert the accusation onto someone else. Once the final clue is found, interact with one of the red button's placed in front of each NPC in order to choose the murderer.

So....To Arrest or To Be Arrested? It's up to you!

[Controls]

-Use the 'WASD' keys to move your character

-Use 'SPACEBAR' to Jump

-Use the 'E' button to interact with interactable objects
